name: Delicious Damper
author: David P.
summary: This recipe, when completely finished, tastes like a biscuit. It is an Australian recipe that I made, was very excited about and was hurrying to get to the computer and submit it. Enjoy!
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
In a large bowl, sift together flour, salt and baking powder
Stir in milk until a soft dough forms
Form into a round and place on an ungreased baking sheet
Bake in preheated oven for 30 minutes
Remove loaf from oven, cut in half and continue baking for 10 more minutes
Place on a wire rack to cool before serving
